petitionerArgument.summaryOfViolation: Unlawful rent increase above allowed Annual General Adjustment (AGA) and multiple rent increases within 12 months
Landlord failed to register property with Rent Stabilization Program before implementing rent increases

rationale.respondentHadNotice: No, landlord failed to provide required CSFRA notices to tenant
rationale.issueDuration: Multiple unlawful increases from March 2022 through October 2022
rationale.evidenceAssessment: Documentation showed rent increases exceeded AGA limits and property was not properly registered
rationale.impactAssessment: Tenant overpaid rent due to multiple unlawful increases
